original: Carl Axel, ryttmästare, direktör. Smedby, f. 7/3/94 i Förlösa, Kal|mar 1., av Carl Jolian Herman W. o. Laura Ingeborg Anna Johnson. G. 20 m. Dagny Anderson. — Stud :ex. i Kailmar 12, 0’ff:ex. 14, RS 14-15 o. 21-22. Und:iöjtn. i Skånska dragonreg. 14, v. reg. 16, löjtn. 18, på friv. överg:-stat 26, ryttmäst. i Skånska kav:reg. res. 29; tjg. v. tyska statens tränings-etabl. i Hoppegarten 23. Verkst. dir. i A-B Eol sed. 38, dir. i Handels A-B Adolf Anderson i Kalmar sed. 33. , Carl Gustaf, konstruk-tionschef, Göteiborg, f. 24/2/94 i Skaftö, Gbgs o. Boih. 1., av Oscar W. o. Augusta Gedda. G. 32 m. Signe Lundh. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs h. real 12, inig:-ex. (VoV) v. CTH 17. Res. t. Danm., Tyskl. 31, Belg., Holl. 34. Anst. v. J. Lindbergs ing:byrå i Gbg 17-18, h. Gbgs hamnstyr. ,fr. 119, byråing. v. särsk. avd. f. bygg. av Götaälvbron 35-39, byråingenjör v. Gbgs hamn 44, kon str: chef där fr. 47. Medl. av Chalm. ing:’fören., Tekn. samf., Sv:es högskibüld. väg- o. vattenfbygg. rUks-förb. (S. V. R.), Odd Fellow, Log. nr 69 Lennart Torstenson.
translated:
Carl Axel, captain, director. Smedby, b. 7/3/94 in Förlösa, Kalmar 1, son of Carl Jolian Herman W. and Laura Ingeborg Anna Johnson. Married 20 times to Dagny Anderson. Studied: graduated from Kalmar 12, exemptions 14, RS 14-15 and 21-22. Lieutenant in Skånska dragonreg. 14, v. reg. 16, lieutenant 18, on voluntary leave 26, reserve captain in Skånska kav:reg. 29; served in the German state training establishment in Hoppegarten 23. Executive director of A-B Eol since 38, director of Handels A-B Adolf Anderson in Kalmar since 33. 

Carl Gustaf, construction manager, Göteborg, b. 24/2/94 in Skaftö, Gbgs and Bohus län, son of Oscar W. and Augusta Gedda. Married in 32 to Signe Lundh. Studied: graduated from Göteborg higher real school 12, engineering degree (VoV) from CTH 17. Resided in Denmark, Germany 31, Belgium, Netherlands 34. Employed by J. Lindbergs Engineering Office in Göteborg 17-18, at Göteborg harbor authority from 19, bureau engineer in special department for construction of Götaälvbron 35-39, bureau engineer at Göteborg harbor 44, construction manager there from 47. Member of Chalmers Engineering Association, Technical Society, Swedish High School Building Road and Water Construction Association (S.V.R.), Odd Fellow, Lodge No. 69 Lennart Torstenson.

militaryService.name: Served in the German state training establishment in Hoppegarten

hiringOrganization.name: Handels A-B Adolf Anderson in Kalmar
